API Reference
=============

This section provides detailed API documentation for all TabEval components.

Core Modules
------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   metrics

Framework Components
--------------------

**Plugins System**
   Access to 20+ synthetic data generators across multiple domains

**DataLoaders** 
   Data handling for tabular, survival, time series, and image data

**Benchmarks**
   Comparative evaluation utilities with caching and reproducibility

**Metrics**
   Privacy evaluation using DCR (Distance to Closest Record) methodology

**Utils**
   Supporting functionality for reproducibility, serialization, and optimization
